scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains records pertaining to the organizational activities and structure of the Society, including minutes, annual reports, budgets, and membership lists. It also includes material created for, or generated by, its member activities including programs, brochures, and scrapbooks with newspaper clippings. There are two photographs and a small collection of sheet music. Little correspondence is included. The records have divided into the following seven series: 1. Correspondence; 2. Reports and minutes; 3. Membership and activities; 4. Printed material and photographs; 5. Scrapbooks; 6. Manuscripts; 7. Sheet music.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: This collection combines the accessions 1977.221 and 1977.201.221.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Morning Choral Society was founded in 1919 by Herbert Stavely Sammond (1871-1964) as a non-sectarian women’s amateur vocal group. The group’s regular activities included two major annual concerts in the spring and winter. During the group's early years, rehearsals were held on Tuesday mornings, and then on Wednesday mornings and Monday evenings during its later period. Sammond acted as organist and conductor until his retirement in 1948. The Society was also involved with social events and fundraisers such as annual Spring luncheons and card parties. Howard Kasschan took over as conductor in 1949. The Society voted to disband at its annual meeting in 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence consists of a few letters received by the society, as well as several pieces of blank stationery, assumed to be samples.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reports and minutes contains reports from the Society’s officers as well as from the chairpersons of the various committees. Also included are the minutes of board meetings and annual meetings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Membership activities consists of membership lists, activities, notices, and speeches.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Event materials and photographs consists of programs, invitations, concert tickets, luncheon menus, calendars of events, and two 1944 photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks and clippings consists of scrapbooks and newspaper clippings. The bulk of the collection is newspaper clippings. Items also include programs, flyers, posters, correspondence, a disbandment letter and an IRS return.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Herbert Stavely Sammond manuscript consists of a typed manuscript of the autobiography of Herbert Stavely Sammond.
